message.body: Just got a msg from Shaw's pharm here that Upromise card is being declined. Not sure where my card & driv license are right now. Pls email me whether eithe of u have used card in past couple of days, where & for what. I don't have 800 # on back of card. Have 3:30 appt now. Are my card & lic next to toilet? In pocket of deep teAl Eileen fisher lightweight jacket? Is jacket in kitchen or BMW? Plz email
I haven't used card or license since trip I think
Fwd from Dad: Shaws is all set. Card charge has now been approved.
Will look here again for MC & lic later tonite. Thanks for checking, Za. In case either of u stumbles upon the jacket, it's v lightweight, and we had recently debated whether it was black or teal.
Paul, what happened re pharm rejection?
￼Found between drying rack and tv in kitchen. May I have it?
￼Found this on the left side of the island. What is its deal?
First of all... Hi, [Liza], how're u doing? Is the [hunting and gathering] going well? I miss you, too! ;}
Hahaha hi [mom], how are you doing? Is the [befriending toilets] going well? (Just kidding)

The bowl, if plastic &~12"d & has A dimple in the bottom,is from a salAd spinner. Look in cabinet next to fridge or corner cabinet & see if the 1 there is a complete spinner set. It replaced 1 that had a broken mechanism.
??? [befriending toilets]
If bowl is indeed so orphaned, it's yours.
Toilet hugging
I don't hug toilets.
I know it was a joke
And the watch?
Take the watch. I don't know if it works. Dirty. Very. Utility toothbrush & toothpaste unless believed not water resistant.
Feeling low & must shower.
Ok. Thanks!
I'm sorry. I was trying to heat up dinner quickly and skimmed your text, and I only saw the shower part. Explanation, not excuse. Are you okay?
Not really. Must go to bed now.
Okay well I love you!!! ❤
Thank you for the hippy candle! It's great :) when I burn it and it melts down over the bottle I will send you a photo :) how are you feeling today?

If either or both of u can use help or support tonite, I can leave here by 7. That could include picking up food 4 u-- ?Shaws?takeout.
Would need to be back b4 11. FYI, we eat at 5. I'm on cleanup til 6, when we have daily self-assessment group.

You & Dad should decide about my being there based on your getting fed, carefully packing up the truck & car, and getting plenty of sleep. And Dad Will fade and should be encouraged to go to bed early.

If u want/haven't found any among your desired extras--listed in Dad's fwded texts or otherwise, tell me. Did u find Liza box in Dedham with toaster oven? Do u have a multi-tool, or any tools & hardware besides hammer & pliers? That tiny screwdriver set can't give u any torque without handle length, and the tips are way too delicate for most jobs. I think I've figured out where more tools are.
See where u stand and what u want, & txt or leave vmail before 7. Phone is on silent/stun. Gotta go
Safe and wondrous journey, m'loves <x3
Hi mom! Wanted to say hi and I love you since dad has been sending you all the texts. We are at Tiffin with Anna getting Indian food :)
Oh, hi Anna! ;) Thanx for the heavy lifting, good luck w/your paper, and enjoy the summer... when it cools off a bit...? Y'all order me sum biryani--b there inna minit. ...Love u 2, Zabu!

Just opened ur email, Paul. If web is right, plane is still on Tarmac in Columbus. Left u vmail just now. Hope u both enjoyed the company of friends y'day & got some good sleep. I'm at home. Update me if u can. Just cleaned floors, hosed off a smelly wet beardie, collar, 2 doormats & then myself, clothed. lunchtime. Love u both
